name: expense-tracker
description: Track expenses, scan bills, and automate reimbursements

scripts.cap:add:android: npm run build && npx cap add android
scripts.cap:add:ios: npm run build && npx cap add ios
scripts.cap:sync: npm run build && npx cap sync
scripts.android: npm run build && npx cap sync android && npx cap open android
scripts.ios: npm run build && npx cap sync ios && npx cap open ios

author: Expense Tracker Team
